        Builds and add the choice box to the list of selectables
        Parameters:
        id - the ID (unique string identifier) of the selectable
        prettyName - the text to dislay to the user
        color - the color of the text
        line - the Array of Strings to append at the end of text

      • createSelectableBox

        private java.lang.String[][] createSelectableBox​(int index,
                                                 java.lang.String str,
                                                 java.lang.String color,
                                                 java.lang.String[] line)
        Builds the graphical representation of the choice box
        Parameters:
        index - the number corresponding to the selection
        str - the text to display to the user
        color - the color of the text
        line - the Array of Strings to append at the end of text
        Returns:
        A matrix of Strings (escape color - char - escape color)
